publish.script: #!/bin/bash # the docbook-style-xsl rpm has faulty post scripts; ignore errors on install warning=`yum sync -y -q` if [[ $? != 0 ]] && [[ ! `echo $warning | grep docbook-style-xsl` ]]; then echo 'yum update failed' >&2 exit 1 fi
#!/bin/bash # the docbook-style-xsl rpm has faulty postun scripts; force removal if rpm -q docbook-style-xsl; then rpm -e docbook-style-xsl --noscripts --nodeps fi
